name: AstroDude
description:
- This game is a short levels parkour game, you have to reach the portals and avoid falling in lava to get to the next level, it takes about 1.5 min to finish, but the question is
Can you speedrun this game in less than 1 minute ?

 -btw This game was made in 24 hours by a youtuber called MGD (AKA me) check out my channel pls :)
